typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		{Region ID} as integer,
		Target as decimal(18,5)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtTargetTable
source(output(
		{Producto ID} as string,
		{Numero Producto} as string,
		{Producto Sub Categoria ID} as string,
		{Nombre Producto} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTProduct
source(output(
		{Subcategoria Producto ID} as string,
		{Categoria Producto ID} as string,
		{Descripcion Subcategoria} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTProductSubcategory
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ExtLTCustomer
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		{Codigo Postal} as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTCstomerlocalization
source(output(
		{Categoria Producto ID} as string,
		{Descripcion Categoria} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTCategory
ExtTargetTable keyGenerate(output(PK_Metas as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AgregarSurrogateKey
ExtLTCstomerlocalization, ExtLTCustomer union(byName: true)~> UnionCustomer
ExtLTProduct keyGenerate(output(PK_Producto as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyProduct
SurrogateKeyProduct, ExtLTCategory union(byName: true)~> ProductoUnion1
ProductoUnion1, ExtLTProductSubcategory union(byName: true)~> ProductoUnion2
ExtLTCustomer keyGenerate(output(PK_Cliente as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCustomer
AgregarSurrogateKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Meta as integer,
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		Region_ID as integer,
		TARGET as decimal(18,5)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['Truncate Table DIM_Metas'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Meta = PK_Metas,
		{Año},
		Mes,
		Region_ID = {Region ID},
		TARGET = Target
	)) ~> AlmacenarMetasDWH
UnionCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Codigo as integer,
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		Region as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> AlmacenarCliente
ProductoUnion2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Producto_ID as integer,
		Categoria_Producto_ID as string,
		Descripcion_Subcategoria as string,
		Numero_Producto as string,
		Categoria_ID as string,
		Nombre_Producto as string,
		Categoria_Producto_ID_1 as string,
		Descripcion_Categoria as string,
		Subcategoria_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> AlmacenarProducto
